name: boxLife (itch) (Code Scrambler)
description:
Welcome to boxLife! 

The goal is to reach the highest possible age while staying inside the BOX. Combine items to make sure you're healthy enough to not die.

Controls
  • Press [Advance Time] to get a new item or to age up
  • Click on an item to pick it up
  • Click on it again to let it go
  • Touch together 2 items to combine them
Combinations Item 1Item 2ResultFamilyAgeLoveFamilyLoveHappiness+
